summary: Project with form submissions requiring an admin panel for data management
architectural_notes: Form submissions stored in Internet Computer canister backend
Admin panel requires authentication layer for secure access
Export functionality needed for form submission data

existing_features.title: Create an admin dashboard page that displays all contact form submissions from the backend in a table format, showing name, email, message, and timestamp for each submission
Implement search and filter functionality on the admin dashboard to allow filtering submissions by name, email, or message content
Add export functionality to download form submission data as CSV or JSON format from the admin dashboard
Implement authentication using Internet Identity to restrict admin panel access so only authenticated users can view the admin dashboard
Create routing to separate the admin panel from the public-facing homepage, with a distinct URL path for the admin interface

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin panel to view all form submissions in a table
Search and filter functionality for form submissions
Authentication to restrict admin panel access
